text: Inna Fi Khalqi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Akhtilafi Al-Layli Wa An-Nahari Wa Al-Fulki Allati Tajri Fi Al-Bahri Bima Yanfa`u An-Nasa Wa Ma 'Anzala Allahu Mina As-Sama'i Min Ma'in Fa'ahya Bihi Al-'Arđa Ba`da Mawtiha Wa Baththa Fiha Min Kulli Dabbatin Wa Tasrifi Ar-Riyahi Wa As-Sahabi Al-Musakhkhari Bayna As-Sama'i Wa Al-'Arđi La'ayatin Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
